channel.title: Connection help :D
channel.description:
ok when people try login in It says on server side in command promp BANNING HOST (Flooding)
Is it possiable i could remove The flooding Statement? to stop this from happen? and then u keep clicking login Says no reponse from server and server side again - CLIENT REJECTED (iphere) (idk here)
